title: Bloomberg Markets: PNC's Stone on Good Quarter for GDP Growth
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: PNC's Stone on Good Quarter for GDP Growth
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Bill Stone Global Chief Investment Strategist PNC Asset Management Group Discussing the markets and investment strategy. Oliver Renick, Bloomberg News Stocks Reporter, also participates in the discussion.
